Html:
Microsoft PIA contains interface Microsoft.Office.Interop.Outlook.FormRegionStartup but NetOffice doesn't. My Outlook addin should implement FormRegionStartup interface but I can't do it with NetOffice.

There are two classes:

  • OutlookApi.FormRegionStartup
  • OutlookApi._FormRegionStartup

but no interface.

How can I implement it with NetOffice?

hey dude,
sorry, codeplex doesnt throw notications for new discussions at the moment.

you right, these interface are special because you have to implement these interfaces in a early bind way. i have no experience with outlook, thats the reason for in NetOffice these interfaces are not usable at the moment because NetOffice offers the interfaces as latebinding wrapper classes.
the right way is to implement these interfaces is similar to IExtensiblity or ICustomRibbonUI(early bind). i change the markup in my codegenerator and create a new set of -lastest build- assemblies as fast as possible.

(internal notice for project members) if you need special priority support, please contact me(mail, skype, whatever)

Sebastian
